tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_medication_usage (
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    medication_id INT NOT NULL,
    dosage VARCHAR(50),
    usage_date DATE,
    effectiveness_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE medications ( 
    medication_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    medication_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    dosage VARCHAR(20), 
    patient_id INT, 
    effectiveness VARCHAR(50), 
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE medication_history (
    history_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    medication_id UUID,
    date_prescribed DATE,
    effectiveness_rating FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (medication_id) REFERENCES medications(medication_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT NOT NULL,
  gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Medications (
  medication_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  manufacturer VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Prescriptions (
  prescription_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT NOT NULL,
  medication_id INT NOT NULL,
  dosage VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE MedicationHistory (
  history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  prescription_id INT NOT NULL,
  effectiveness_rating INT,
  usage_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE UsageLogs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    medication_id UUID REFERENCES Medications(medication_id),
    usage_date DATE,
    dosage_taken DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE EffectivenessLogs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    medication_id UUID REFERENCES Medications(medication_id),
    log_date DATE,
    effectiveness_score INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE AdverseEvents (
    event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    medication_id UUID REFERENCES Medications(medication_id),
    event_date DATE,
    event_description TEXT
);
